features.text: Added templates for new boards, allowing you to create a board with some initial classifications.
features.reasoning: You can use one of your existing boards as a template too. If you don't see it in the template list, open the board and "re-save" the classifications to generate the template.

bugs.text: Resolved an issue causing blocks to stay expanded after previewing their contents.
Auto-closed some notifications and windows specific to the app when navigating away from the app.

tweaks.text: Changed the release notes "attention-grabber" to be less intrusive and frustrating.
Improved the pink underline for multi-line text, which is especially relevant for long links in a block's text editor field.
Updated the "introduction text" styling of the edit classifications and fields dialogs for better theme consistency.
